segment.source: Edge Security Software Impact
segment.target: Edge Security Software Impact

segment.source: Edge Security Software Impact
segment.target: Edge Security Software Impact

segment.source: Edge Security Software Impact
segment.target: Edge Security Software Impact

segment.source: Applies To: Windows 10
segment.target: Applies To: Windows 10

segment.source: The Edge Security Software Impact assessment measure aspects of Microsoft Edge that are typically impacted by antimalware.
segment.target: The Edge Security Software Impact assessment measure aspects of Microsoft Edge that are typically impacted by antimalware.

segment.source: The assessment measures the impact on the launch and navigate times of Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: The assessment measures the impact on the launch and navigate times of Microsoft Edge.

segment.source: In this topic:
segment.target: In this topic:

segment.source: Before You Begin
segment.target: Before You Begin

segment.source: Settings
segment.target: Settings

segment.source: For more information about results produced by this assessment, see Results for the Edge Security Software Impact Assessment.
segment.target: For more information about results produced by this assessment, see Results for the Edge Security Software Impact Assessment.

segment.source: Before You Begin
segment.target: Before You Begin

segment.source: Warning Ensure that Microsoft Edge is your default HTTP protocol handler.
segment.target: Warning Ensure that Microsoft Edge is your default HTTP protocol handler.

segment.source: To verify this, launch the Settings app and navigate to "System - Default apps - Choose default apps by protocol".
segment.target: To verify this, launch the Settings app and navigate to "System - Default apps - Choose default apps by protocol".

segment.source: Check that Microsoft Edge is selected for HTTP.
segment.target: Check that Microsoft Edge is selected for HTTP.

segment.source: For best results:
segment.target: For best results:

segment.source: Exit any open desktop apps or Windows apps.
segment.target: Exit any open desktop apps or Windows apps.

segment.source: Complete any first-run tasks you want to assess, particular related to security applications being installed and prepped.
segment.target: Complete any first-run tasks you want to assess, particular related to security applications being installed and prepped.

segment.source: Do not interact with the PC while the assessment is running.
segment.target: Do not interact with the PC while the assessment is running.

segment.source: Settings
segment.target: Settings

segment.source: By default, this assessment uses the recommended settings.
segment.target: By default, this assessment uses the recommended settings.

segment.source: You can also customize these settings if you want to gather different data than what is captured by default.
segment.target: You can also customize these settings if you want to gather different data than what is captured by default.

segment.source: For example, you might identify specific data that would help you do a more detailed analysis of a particular aspect of the computer.
segment.target: For example, you might identify specific data that would help you do a more detailed analysis of a particular aspect of the computer.

segment.source: The following table describes the assessment settings, recommended setting values, and alternative values for each setting.
segment.target: The following table describes the assessment settings, recommended setting values, and alternative values for each setting.

segment.source: Setting
segment.target: Setting

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Use recommended settings
segment.target: Use recommended settings

segment.source: By default, this checkbox is selected and recommended settings are used.
segment.target: By default, this checkbox is selected and recommended settings are used.

segment.source: To change the settings for this assessment, you must first clear this checkbox.
segment.target: To change the settings for this assessment, you must first clear this checkbox.

segment.source: URL
segment.target: URL

segment.source: You can use this setting to specify a website for the assessment to use as part of the test instead of using the local test page included with the assessment.
segment.target: You can use this setting to specify a website for the assessment to use as part of the test instead of using the local test page included with the assessment.

segment.source: If this is not specified, the local test page will be used.
segment.target: If this is not specified, the local test page will be used.

segment.source: You can test live or local URLs.
segment.target: You can test live or local URLs.

segment.source: Iterations
segment.target: Iterations

segment.source: You can use this setting to specify the number of times that the assessment runs.
segment.target: You can use this setting to specify the number of times that the assessment runs.

segment.source: The results are an average of the iterations.
segment.target: The results are an average of the iterations.

segment.source: Maximize Edge
segment.target: Maximize Edge

segment.source: This setting has no effect.
segment.target: This setting has no effect.
